trans-unit.source: Creates a user interface element that enables users to invoke ASP.NET event handlers and it provides a means to post user input from UI elements back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 建立可讓使用者叫用 ASP.NET 事件處理常式，並且提供方法來將使用者輸入從 UI 項目張貼至伺服器的使用者介面項目。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The Command control displays as an interactive UI element on the requesting device.
trans-unit.target: 命令控制項顯示為要求的裝置上的互動式 UI 項目。

trans-unit.source: The label of the UI element comes from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property, which is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> base class.
trans-unit.target: UI 項目標籤來自<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>屬性，繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl>基底類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Avoid using special characters in ASP.NET mobile Web page URLs.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 避免 ASP.NET mobile Web 網頁 Url 中使用特殊字元。

trans-unit.source: The HREF tags generated for posting `Command` events back to the server are not strictly validated.
trans-unit.target: 針對張貼產生 HREF 標記`Command`回傳至伺服器的事件不會嚴格驗證。

trans-unit.source: For example, a URL that includes spaces results in the generation of WML that cannot be handled by some WML browsers.
trans-unit.target: 例如，包含空格的 URL 會導致 WML 無法處理某些 WML 瀏覽器所產生。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the specified control causes server-side validation to occur on all controls on the form.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否在指定的控制項，會導致伺服器端驗證，則會發生在表單上的所有控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: For validation to occur on a form, the form must be submitted with a control that raises validation, and must have its CausesValidation property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 為了執行表單驗證，必須提交表單與控制項所引發的驗證，以及必須將其 CausesValidation 屬性設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control is currently the only control that raises validation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>控制項是目前唯一引發驗證。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified control causes server-side validation to occur on all controls on the form; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的控制項在表單上的所有控制項上進行伺服器端驗證否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user activates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者啟用<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control is activated, it raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A> event.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>啟動控制項，它會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Device-Specific Rendering" and "Device-Specific Behavior" sections in <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command?displayProperty=fullName>的 「 裝置特定呈現 」 和 「 裝置的特定行為 」 章節

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the argument associated with the command in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 設定或傳回中的命令相關聯的引數<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The argument associated with the command in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的命令相關聯的引數<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command name associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與相關聯的命令名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref>引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the render style for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定呈現樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Access the two available types through the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 存取透過兩個可用的類型<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName> (default) The command is rendered as a button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName>（預設值） 這個命令會呈現為按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName> The command is rendered as a link.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName>這個命令會呈現為連結。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Format property supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName> value only on devices that support JavaScript as indicated by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 格式屬性支援<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName>值只支援 JavaScript，所指定的裝置上<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat"></xref> value indicating the render style for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CommandFormat"> </xref>值，指出轉換樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the URL of the image source for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> control when the control is rendered as an image button.
trans-unit.target: 設定或傳回的影像來源的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref>控制當控制項會轉譯為影像按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not <xref:System.String.Empty> and the device can handle image buttons, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control uses the image instead of a button or link text.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性不是<xref:System.String.Empty>而且裝置可以處理影像按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>控制項使用的映像，而非按鈕或連結的文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> </xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image source for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> when the control is rendered as an image button.
trans-unit.target: 影像來源的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"> </xref>時控制項也會轉譯為影像按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control submits the form.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否送出表單。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Mobile controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>, can override this method to determine whether this is a control used for form submission.
trans-unit.target: 行動控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>，可以覆寫這個方法來判斷是否這是用來以送出表單的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: Other controls can be extended by providing logic to programmatically determine whether or not they must be submit controls, for example, by checking for specific properties.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項可以透過提供以程式設計方式判斷必須是 submit 控制項，例如，藉由檢查特定屬性的邏輯擴充。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A control is considered to be a form-submit control only if it implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> method to capture the postback event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Form-submit 控制項，它會實作時，才會被視為控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>方法來擷取回傳事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is not registered for the default event handler, even if the method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它不會註冊預設事件處理常式，即使該方法會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control submits the form; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項送出表單。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user selects a command that is associated with an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref> item.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者選取相關聯的命令，就會發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: When an ItemCommand event handler is defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control notifies the handler when an item event is generated through user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 定義 ItemCommand 事件處理常式時，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>項目產生一個事件會透過使用者互動時，控制項告知處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click> event, the ItemCommand event is bubbled up to the parent controls.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click>事件，事件會反昇至父控制項 ItemCommand。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click>

trans-unit.source: The ItemCommand event rendering is device-specific and is discussed in detail in the "Device-Specific Behavior" section of <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: ItemCommand 事件轉譯為特定裝置和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command?displayProperty=fullName> < 裝置的特定行為 > 一節中詳細討論

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnItemCommand%2A> event is raised after an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnItemCommand%2A>之後引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnItemCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: In a scenario where you repeat the same set of actions each time a command button is clicked, you can use either the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control to identify which command button the user clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，您重複相同的動作集每次按下命令按鈕，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandArgument%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>按一下的控制項，來識別哪些命令按鈕的使用者。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the adapter associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> control has handled loading the post data.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否與配接器相關聯<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref>控制項已處理張貼資料的載入。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.

trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Different devices might provide their data back to the calling server in different ways.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 不同的裝置可能會以不同的方式提供資料給呼叫端的伺服器。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the name of a parameter collection.
trans-unit.target: 參數集合的名稱的參考。

trans-unit.source: A parameter collection of postback data.
trans-unit.target: 參數的回傳資料集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the adapter associated with this control has handled loading the post data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果與這個控制項關聯之配接器已經處理過，載入張貼資料;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called when the user activates the control.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者啟動控制項時呼叫。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the OnClick method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: OnClick 方法的預設實作會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click>

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override the OnClick method to perform other tasks.
trans-unit.target: 繼承的類別可以覆寫 OnClick 方法，以執行其他工作。

trans-unit.source: An object defined by an <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 所定義的物件<xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when the user activates the control.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者啟動控制項時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks.
trans-unit.target: 繼承的類別可以覆寫此方法以執行其他工作。

trans-unit.source: The OnItemCommand event is raised after the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A> event.
trans-unit.target: 數引發之後<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you must take the same actions for multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> buttons.
trans-unit.target: 當您必須執行多個相同的動作，這非常有用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control to identify which <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandArgument%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>控制項，找出哪個<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>button 已按下。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref>物件，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control when it is clicked to raise a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: RaisePostBackEvent 方法會在內部使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>控制按一下引發時<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知 ASP.NET 應用程式的狀態<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command"></xref>控制項已變更。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method can be overridden in a derived class to raise change events for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: RaisePostDataChangedEvent 方法可以引發變更事件的衍生類別中被覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>控制當回傳至伺服器。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the label used when a softkey is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 設定或傳回顯示螢幕鍵盤時所用的標籤。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: This property is used only for devices that support softkeys.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只適用於支援螢幕鍵盤的裝置。

trans-unit.source: If this property is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property of the control is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是空的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>使用控制項的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property is empty or its length is less than 9, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property is used for the softkey label.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>屬性是空的或它的長度小於 9<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>屬性適用於螢幕鍵盤標籤。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the word `Go` (if it is a submit control command) is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個字`Go`（如果它是送出控制命令） 會顯示。

trans-unit.source: The value of the SoftkeyLabel property is truncated to 12 characters (the standard maximum length of a softkey).
trans-unit.target: SoftkeyLabel 屬性的值會截斷為 12 個字元 （標準最大長度是螢幕鍵盤的）。

trans-unit.source: The label used when a soft key is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 顯示螢幕鍵盤時所用的標籤。

trans-unit.target: 參數集合的名稱的參考。

trans-unit.target: 參數的回傳資料集合。
